summary: A collection of helper utilities for computing surface‑based medical imaging metrics, including lookup tables that map voxel neighbor codes to normal vectors, contour lengths, and surface areas, as well as functions to retrieve pre‑computed tables, handle background exclusion, and perform basic tensor checks and spacing preparation.
business_intent: Enable accurate and efficient calculation of surface distance, surface area, and contour length metrics within the MONAI framework, supporting evaluation of segmentation quality in clinical imaging workflows.
